ValidationRule.description: Validate Opportunity Stage before modification of “StarTrack Opportunity?”, “StarTrack Primary Pickup (Postocode)” or “StarTrack Minimum Monthly Spend”.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(ISCHANGED(APTMinimumMonthlySpend__c), ISCHANGED(APTPostcodeSuburb__c), ISCHANGED(APTPostcodeSuburb__c)) && OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closed Won"),ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closed Lost"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closed Disqualified"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closed Duplicate"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot update “StarTrack Opportunity?”, “StarTrack Primary Pickup (Postocode)” or “StarTrack Minimum Monthly Spend” as the Opportunity is closed. Please get in touch with your CRM Specialist partner.
